name: Groupe Sleipnir
description: The Sleipnir Group, located in Caen, brings together 3 companies and 48 people performing in the digital and communication sectors. Our group realizes 2M € of turnover on 2017 and develops not only in France but also in other parts of Europe as well. Resting on strong values and a dynamic and innovative spirit, Sleipnir is a group, unlike others. We have imagined and are still creating projects.
